description.value: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

Sometimes called a hauberk, this is a long shirt constructed of the same metal rings as chainmail. However, it is much lighter than chainmail and protects only the torso, upper arms, and upper legs of its wearer.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

Contains formulas for all common alchemical items of 19th level or lower

A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

rules.text: Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # acid splash damage]] acid splash and [[/r 4d6 #persistent acid damage]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Acid Damage}
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # fire splash damage]] fire splash and [[/r 4 #persistent fire damage]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # electricity splash damage]] and the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the start of your next turn.
Effect: The bomb also deals [[/r 4 # cold splash damage]] and the target takes a –15-foot penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

description.value:
Ingnovim carries

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Acid Flask (Major)]{Acid Flask (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Major)]{Alchemist's Fire (Major)}

2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bestial Mutagen (Major)]{Bestial Mutagen (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Bottled Lightning (Major)]{Bottled Lightning (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Frost Vial (Major)]{Frost Vial (Major)}

2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)}

4 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Elixir of Life (True)]{Elixir of Life (True)}

These items last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations.

Trigger Ingnovim damages a creature with a syringe Strike;

Effect The creature injected with unstable mutagen must attempt a Fortitude save to resist the injection.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.

Failure The target's body shifts and mutates, growing difficult to control; the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} for 24 hours.

Critical Failure The target's body completely distorts into a shuddering blob of warped flesh that is incapable of action; the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Paralyzed]{Paralyzed}. Every 24 hours, the target may attempt a new saving throw against this effect; on a critical success, the paralysis ends.
Ingnovim's body has adapted to the constant use of his mutagens. He does not suffer the drawback of any bestial mutagens but is still affected normally by other mutagens.
Ingnovim draws an alchemical bomb with an Interact action and throws it as a ranged Strike.
